transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I take you to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am big and yellow (sometimes!)
🛑 I stop to pick up kids.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Lots of people can ride in me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
💺 People sit inside of me.
✈️ I have big wings.

transport.question: I go on the water and can be very big. I carry people or things across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.
🚢 I'm bigger than a rowboat.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You wear a helmet when you ride me.
🦶 You use pedals to move.
🔔 I sometimes have a bell.

transport.question: I ride on tracks and carry many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚂 I make a lot of noise.
💺 You can sit down inside.
🛤️ I need special roads to move.

transport.question: I'm a car that helps people who are sick or hurt. I have a siren!

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud noise to warn people.
🤕 I take people to the hospital.
🚑 I have a special light on top.

transport.question: I have a big ladder and help put out fires. I also have a siren and bright lights!

hints.text: 🚒 I am red.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters drive me.
🔥 I spray water.

transport.question: I go under the sea. People can look out and see fish. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can go really deep.
🪟 I have windows to see the ocean.
⚓ I do not float on top of the water

transport.question: I am a fast car that chases bad guys. I have a siren and flashing lights.

hints.text: 👮 Policemen drive me.
🚨 I have a siren to warn others.
🔦 I have flashing lights.

transport.question: I can take you to space! I am very fast and go very high.

hints.text: 🚀 I am used for space travel.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🪐 I can go to the moon.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a yummy snack for rabbits!
🌱 I grow from a tiny seed.
🥬 I am a healthy vegetable.

plant.question: I have a trunk and branches, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍁 I have leaves that change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I am often given as a gift.
🌸 I grow on a plant and need sunshine.
🐝 I help bees make honey.

plant.question: I am long, green, and crunchy. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 People put me in sandwiches!
🥒 I can be pickled.
🥗 I am good in salads.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm, sunny places.
🥥 You can drink my water.
🐒 Monkeys like to climb to get me.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit that is red inside. I have lots of black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and refreshing in the summer.
⚫ My seeds are small and black.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow seeds that you can eat as popcorn. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Farmers grow me in fields.
🍿 You can make a yummy snack from my kernels.
🥇 I am yellow and grow on a cob.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. People say I am a symbol of love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 My flowers come in many colors, like red, pink, and white.
🌿 You have to be careful of my sharp thorns.
❤️ I am a popular gift for Valentine's Day.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall stalk and is often used for making cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 You can make bread and pasta from me.
🚜 Farmers harvest me in large fields.
☀️ I turn golden yellow when I am ready to be picked.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows in bunches and is often yellow. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I'm a favorite snack for many people.
😋 I'm sweet and delicious when ripe.
🐒 Monkeys are often seen eating me.
